{"step_by_step_thinking": "The child's symptoms and lab results suggest a glycogen storage disease, which are a group of metabolic disorders caused by enzyme deficiencies that affect glycogen metabolism. This step is catalyzed by the enzyme glucose-6-phosphatase.
